item.dc:creator: Joanna Kang
item.description:
LinkedIn Learning: Now Available for UCSF LinkedIn Learning (previously Lynda.com) is now available to UCSF through a campus license. LinkedIn Learning has thousands of video courses covering technical, business, software, and creative topics. Courses include: Zoom Engagement for Meetings, Working From Home Strategies, Using Python for Automation, EndNote Essentials, and ...
